      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle(int id,
               Color c,
               int numberWheel,
               Location location,
               int km,
               boolean lights)
        the constructor of the class Vehicle
        Parameters:
        id - - the vehicle id , the id have to be 1,000 - 1,000,000
        c - - the 'enum' Color
        location - - the instance of Location class
        km - - the KM of the vehicle
        numberWheel - - number of wheel
        lights - - boolean, true if the lights is on and else false
